backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a VAT rate registry with owner-based access control and API key management, exposing functions to add owners, upsert/list VAT rates, manage API keys, and calculate VAT amounts.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (login, OTP verification, dashboard plan fetch) to their source files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file, serving as a reference index for the project's frontend components, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, chart, and sidebar tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Glotaxa React app, mounting the app into a root div and loading the main TypeScript entry point as an ES module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component managing multi-screen navigation (login, otp, dashboard, main, invoice-preview) with AuthProvider context, routing unauthenticated users to Login and wiring all page transitions including invoice generation.
React component displaying a VAT transaction result card, a scored compliance progress indicator, and a list of compliance warnings with color-coded severity badges.
Empty file placeholder for the FeaturesSection component with no current content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component rendering a copyright notice, a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking, and a VAT disclaimer message.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky app header displaying the Glotaxa logo and, when authenticated, navigation buttons for Dashboard and Sign Out.
frontend/src/components/ProtectedRoute.t: Route guard component that redirects unauthenticated users to the login page and renders children only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/TransportVatModa: Modal dialog explaining UK transport VAT rules: 0% for public bus/train services and 20% for taxis and car hire, with 20% as the default.
frontend/src/contexts/AuthContext.tsx: React context that stores and exposes Supabase authentication state (access token, user ID, plan) sourced from localStorage, with a logout function.
frontend/src/data/vatRules.ts: Defines VAT rate configurations for 11 countries (EU + GB), including standard, reduced, and super-reduced rates, plus UK-specific per-category overrides.
frontend/src/engine/vatEngine.ts: Core VAT calculation engine that determines VAT rate, type, and amount for a given country and product category, handling OSS, UK-specific rules, reverse charge, and public transport edge cases.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor using the current Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hook providing Internet Identity authentication (login, clear, status) via DFINITY's AuthClient, with idle handling disabled by default.
frontend/src/hooks/useSupabaseAuth.ts: Thin wrapper hook that re-exports authentication state and logout from AuthContext for Supabase-based auth consumers.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Tailwind directives, defines CSS custom properties for light/dark theme tokens (colors, radius, sidebar, charts), and applies z-index fixes for dropdown/combobox overlays.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that mounts the root component wrapped with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ApiDocs.tsx: Static documentation page describing the VAT Calculation REST API endpoint, its request parameters, and usage examples, with a back-navigation button to the Invoice tab.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: User dashboard page that fetches and displays the authenticated user's subscription plan from Supabase and provides navigation links to app features and a sign-out action.
frontend/src/pages/Invoice.tsx: Invoice creation page with form fields for seller/buyer details, line items with per-category VAT rate calculation, and PDF/XML export functionality, supporting pre-population data and authentication-gated saving.
frontend/src/pages/InvoicePreview.tsx: Success confirmation page shown after invoice generation, displaying the invoice number, total amount, and status, with navigation buttons to edit the invoice or start a new transaction.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Marketing landing page for Glotaxa featuring a hero section, feature grid highlighting multi-country VAT support, compliant invoices, and PDF export, with a call-to-action button to enter the app.
frontend/src/pages/Login.tsx: Login page that collects a user's email and sends a Supabase OTP via direct API call, then calls onOtpSent to advance to the verification step.
frontend/src/pages/OtpVerification.tsx: OTP verification page that accepts a 6-digit code, exchanges it for a Supabase access token, stores the session in localStorage, and calls onVerified on success.
frontend/src/pages/Pricing.tsx: Pricing page displaying four subscription plans (Free, Starter, Pro, Business) with feature lists and upgrade buttons that call the Supabase API to change the user's plan.
frontend/src/pages/RegionSelect.tsx: Region selection page rendering a grid of EU countries and the UK, allowing the user to pick a seller country before proceeding to the transaction flow.
frontend/src/pages/Transaction.tsx: Transaction page where users configure buyer type, country, VAT category, and net amount to calculate VAT, view compliance scores, risk warnings, and navigate to invoice generation.
frontend/src/types/invoice.ts: TypeScript type definitions for EN 16931-compliant invoice data structures, including header, seller/buyer details, line items, payment terms, and the top-level Invoice16931 interface.
frontend/src/utils/complianceScoreCalcul: Utility that calculates a compliance score (0â€“100) for a transaction by deducting points for missing VAT ID, invoice number, category, or reverse charge note on cross-border B2B transactions.
frontend/src/utils/invoicePDF.ts: Generates and downloads an HTML-based invoice PDF by building a styled HTML document from an Invoice16931 object and opening it in a new browser window for printing.
frontend/src/utils/invoiceXML.ts: Generates a UBL 2.x compliant EN 16931 XML invoice string from an Invoice16931 object, including seller/buyer parties, line items, tax subtotals, and payment means.
frontend/src/utils/riskDetector.ts: Detects VAT compliance risks based on seller/buyer country, buyer type, and VAT category, returning an array of risk warning strings such as OSS registration requirements.
frontend/src/utils/vatEngine.ts: Empty file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/utils/vatLogicExplainer.ts: Generates a detailed human-readable explanation of a VAT decision (OSS, Reverse Charge, Exempt, Zero Rated, standard) based on seller/buyer countries, transaction category, and VAT type.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending the default theme with custom OKLCH-based color tokens, border radii, animations, sidebar colors, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the current project state including architecture notes, existing features, and known issues for an invoice/billing app using Supabase authentication, plan management, and invoice creation via Edge Functions.
